articles.description: India have the bowling attack to be dominant in half the world and competitive in the other half
articles.content: While the Test specialists of this Indian side have said the World Test Championship (WTC) is like a World Cup to them, the team's captain and coach have been disdainful of it, especially the change … [+8805 chars]
